meta.description: Optimize the production of almond and pistachio croissants to minimize total production time.

sets.name: CROISSANTS
sets.description: Types of croissants produced by the bakery.

params.name: time_requirement
params.description: Time required to make each croissant type in minutes.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of croissant to produce.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.description: Minimize the total production time for croissants.

constraints.name: butter_constraint
constraints.description: Total butter used cannot exceed available butter.

constraints.name: flour_constraint
constraints.description: Total flour used cannot exceed available flour.

constraints.name: popularity_constraint
constraints.description: At least three times as many almond croissants as pistachio croissants should be made.
